short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract emails from the web pages you browse. For your security we will not collect email from input box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful Extension To Extract E-Mail ID's Automatically From Web Pages.
Find email addresses in seconds.

No crappy advertisements, no extra junk.

This plugin fetches email ids from the Source Code and has no relevance to what you see on the front, so for example, if you see 3 email ids on the website, plugin may fetch more if it finds hidden email ids in the source.

Informal Disclaimer : This extension is not developed with an intention to spam people with your marketing mails, so use it for your personal stuff only.
